wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Welcome to the ranks of Flack-dom, Harry.
Personally, I'd think they'd want a high-end dev/architect like you on a high-end marketing team. Maybe not at MS, but at lots of companies the marketing folks fall down when they get increasingly separated from the real users, real buyers, and real implementers/developers. Knowing you, I'd think you'd make a great bridge.
